cn.trackCensoredName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.trackName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.releaseNotes: - 提升应用稳定性，确保产品使用更加稳定。
cn.description:
UPDF 是一款全球化的 PDF 编辑器，支持 AI，阅读，编辑，注释、云同步、转换、加密、裁剪、拆分、在线分享 PDF 文档等。1 个账号付费，全平台都可以使用（电脑 + 手机 + iPad），更重要的是，UPDF 不同于市场上大多数商务设计风的 PDF 软件，它更具年轻化高颜值的界面设计让你拥有一个愉快轻松的阅读和办公体验。

主要功能：

1. 编辑 PDF
- 你可以添加或者删除文本，编辑文本属性和格式，比如字体，颜色，大小等。
- UPDF 也支持通过修改文本的对齐方式使您的文档看起来更整洁。
- 对于 PDF 里的图片，你可以进行裁剪，旋转，替换，提取，删除等操作。
- 你可以直接通过拖拽添加和替换图片。
- 支持添加、删除、和编辑水印、背景、以及页眉页脚。

2. AI 功能
- 对 PDF 文档进行总结。
- 对 PDF 文档进行翻译。
- 对 PDF 文档进行解释，润色或编写。
- 与 UPDF AI 自由对话。
- 支持与图片进行自由问答。
- 支持将文档总结生成思维导图。

3. 注释 PDF
- 在阅读 PDF 文档的过程中，你可以对文档内容添加注释，比如高亮，下划线，删除线来标注突出重点内容。
- 你也可以通过添加图形和文本框来注释你的 PDF 文档。
- 如果需要对某些内容进行注解，你可以在文档任意位置添加便签来输入笔记或者审批意见等。
- 你可以在文档中添加并旋转各种各样的签章和贴纸用以注释和评论。
- 若需要在文档里签名，你也可以直接快速地创建你的签名。
- 通过注释列表一键查看或删除所有注释内容。

4. OCR（光学字符识别）（仅适用于官网下载的版本）
- 将扫描的 PDF 转换为可搜索和可编辑的 PDF。
- 支持可根据选择检测的 38 种语言。
- 将可搜索和可编辑的 PDF 转换为纯图像 PDF。

5. 转换 PDF
- 你可以将 PDF 转换为 Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Image, HTML, Text, CSV, XML, PDF/A 等格式。
- 转换之后的文档会保持原文档格式不变。

6. 云同步
- 支持上传文档至 UPDF Cloud，实现 PC + 移动端全平台同步。

7. 管理 PDF 页面
- UPDF 使你可以根据你的需要轻松快速地管理 PDF 页面。
- 对于页面布局，你可以通过旋转调整页面方向，通过拖拽页面调整页面顺序。
- 如果你需要文档中的某些页面，你可以直接提取它们；另外，当你不需要某个页面时，也可以直接删除它。
- 你可以添加空白页或者从其他文件中添加页面。
- 你也可以快速替换文档中的页面。
- 快速根据页码拆分一个 PDF 文档为多个文档。
- 根据需要自定义裁剪页面大小。

8. 浏览和定位 PDF 文档
- 你可以放大或缩小页面，清晰地浏览文档内容。
- 通过在页面添加书签，快速定位找到需要的页面。
- 如果你需要同时查看多个 PDF 文档，不用在另外的窗口打开阅览它们，你可以在同一窗口多个标签打开预览，这样更简单快捷。
- 想要快速找到某文本内容，可以一键搜索查找定位文本。
- 快速通过缩略图旋转，删除，旋转和打印 PDF 页面。
- 通过幻灯片的形式播放 PDF 文档。

9. 保护文档
- 可添加文档打开密码防止未经授权的用户打开。
- 可设置文档功能权限控制密码，限制其他用户打印、编辑、复制 PDF 文档等。

10. 创建 PDF
- 创建空白页。
- 从选区、窗口、或屏幕捕捉创建 PDF。

11. 扁平化 PDF
- 快速扁平化 PDF, 压平文档中的图层。

12. 分享 PDF 文档
- 你可以直接在线分享或者通过邮件直接分享文档。
- 通过电子邮件将您的文档作为附件共享。

应用内购包含的功能
- 无水印保存修改的文档。 
- 无限制的转换文档。 （免费试用版每天最多可转换 2 个文档）

一个会员账号适用于所有平台。

需要帮助？如果你有任何问题，可以邮件联系我们：support@superace.com.
你也可以通过关注我们的官方公众号获取更多有用的信息。
微信公众号：UPDF
微博：赛博爱思UPDF

如果你觉得这个 App 对你是有帮助的，可以在 App Store 留下你的评价，谢谢！

cn.releaseNotes:
Remixlive 8.4 扩展了您在步进音序器中的创作可能性，加入了复音功能！

8.4 版本：
新功能：
- 多音阶步进音序器： 通过直观创新的界面创作旋律并弹奏和弦，重新定义步进音序器。

改进：
- 修复错误并改进用户界面
cn.description:
Remixlive是制作人和DJ的完美节拍制作和现场表演应用。

播放、干扰、混合和重新混合你的音乐。直播!
• 最多可以播放48个音调和节奏同步的循环片段 
• 实时改变调子和BPM
• 即兴演奏和录制现场鼓和乐器
• 使用专业级FXs实时塑造和重采样你的声音
• 创建你自己的序列和模式
• 在时间轴上安排你的声音来完成你的歌曲

用独家样本库为你的曲目增添色彩!
• 在20多种音乐类型中获得超过32000个专业级样本
• 由顶级声音设计师和世界级艺术家完美打造。
• 免收版权费用，可在任何平台上进行个人和商业使用。
• 每周都有新内容！

享受先进的专业级功能!
• 专业音频引擎和样本时间拉伸
• 导入你自己的样本（MP3、WAV、AAC、M4A、AIFF、16/24比特）。
• 连接任何MIDI控制器，你想要多少就有多少 (Launchpad Mini/MK2/MK3/Pro/S/X, AKAI APCMini/MPKminiMK3/APCKey25, DJControl Compact...)
• 用我们的AI干线分离算法对任何歌曲进行混音
• 记录和采样任何音源（Audiobus/麦克风/声卡）
• 通过Ableton Link ""与你的朋友们进行现场演出。

Remixlive拥有您所需要的一切，以创建令人惊叹的曲目，释放您的创造力，并进行令人难忘的现场表演。任何地方!

他们喜欢remixlive

"在便携式设备上制作专业音轨的非常直观的方法。"
- DJ Mag (新闻)

"我已经把Remixlive整合到我的DJ组合中，它提供了很多创造性的潜力。我会向任何艺术家推荐Remixlive，因为它非常简单，你可以创造出很多有趣和鼓舞人心的东西！"
- T78（艺术家）

"绝对令人惊奇的应用程序，太有趣了！它就像一个混合的Dj和一个混合的音乐播放器。它就像一个混合的Dj和作曲工具。我被它的力量和可靠性震惊了。"
- Crystalogic（Remixlive用户）

高级计划和购买
您可以选择单独购买样品包和功能，或通过订阅计划一次性解锁所有功能。

高级订阅计划
Remixlive有月度或年度订阅计划，可以解锁所有可用的和未来的功能，让你获得整个26000多个样本库以及每周一个新的样本包。

条款和条件
购买确认后，付款将从您的账户中扣除。除非在当前期限结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订，否则订阅将自动续订。账户将在当前期限结束前24小时内被收取续订费用，并确定续订费用。订阅可以由用户管理，自动续订可以在购买后进入用户的账户设置中关闭。

使用条款
https://www.mixvibes.com/terms

隐私政策
https://www.mixvibes.com/privacy

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的医药或医疗信息
偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
《避难所：生存》是一款核辐射下的末日生存游戏。在游戏中你将扮演主人公泰德，需要在被核弹袭击的前60秒，合理储备你的物资，营救你的家人至避难所。在游戏中你需要做出一些困难的决定，例如合理分配食物和处理变异蟑螂的袭击等等。

在游戏中你可以坚持多少天？每个人是否都能活下来？当食物耗尽时，又该何去何从？要知道无论你捡到什么，无论你救了谁，都将对你的生存起到至关重要的作用。在游戏中每一个生存故事都是不同的，每天都会有出乎意料的事情发生，所以你需要定量配给食物和水，充分利用你的供给，甚至冒险进入荒地...话不多说，祝你好运！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的亵渎或低俗幽默
cn.releaseNotes:
新增内容:
- 官方地图[糖果王国]
cn.description:
人类！我是Bob，来自《人类跌落梦境（Human: Fall Flat）》里的一名“没有骨气”的软体怪。

《人类跌落梦境（Human: Fall Flat）》有着多样的物理交互规则，鬼畜是你的奥义，你甚至可以躺在地上全身电臀抖动，与自己的队友们手拉手闯关，享受被队友坑害，推下悬崖，或是被当做炮弹发射的整个过程。游戏依然是一次购买，没有其他收费服务。更重要的是，沙雕的并不只有Bob一个，多达八人的TapTap好友一起陪你，还可以随时随地邀请他们一起降智，在联机中互相葬送各自的友谊。

在手机上玩玩家自制的内容？Bob不止一种面孔，既是火影忍者，还要兼职外卖，曾经西装革履，现在专职海盗。手机上会不断更新PC创意工坊中的优秀内容，让你和你的朋友们有更多搞怪故事发生！

- 沙雕玩法，鬼畜新世界，物理碰撞出的沙雕结果，远在你想象之外。
- 优化了动作操作，低上手门槛使你做出许多触手怪才能做出的动作。
- 八人联机的规模让智商呈8倍降落，根本挡不住，TapTap好友互关语音--邀请让友谊联系起来更方便。
- 不断更新&移植的玩家自制沙雕内容。
- 游戏界面现在更简洁好看了，只为衬托你的沙雕之旅。
---------------------
在游戏过程中需要帮助，或遇到问题，都可以加入官方群联系管理员，管理员会与大家一对一沟通，帮忙解决
群号: 1035258482

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的亵渎或低俗幽默
cn.releaseNotes: 1、【泰拉百科】维护调整暂时关闭。
cn.description:
挖掘，战斗，探索，建造！在这个动感十足的冒险游戏里没有什么是不可能的。世界是你的画布，地面是你的油漆。

拿起你的工具出发！制造武器和各种各样的敌人作战。前往地下寻找配件，金钱，以及其他有用的东西。收集资源创造你的世界所需要的一切。建造一栋房子，一个堡垒，甚至是一座城堡。人们会搬到那里居住，而或许他们还会卖给你不同的商品来协助你完成旅程。

但要注意，那有很多挑战在等着你……你能完成任务吗？

【拥有完整体验的移动版】
- 加入最新 1.4.4版本“爱的付出”的全部内容！ (无氪金要素)
- 支持8人联机（联机功能终于能还给大家了）
- 国内官方服务器加持 & 匹配功能 （没有朋友555也能找人一起游戏）
- 买断制（拒绝一刀999）
- 内置了完整的游戏Wiki（“方便知道自己该干嘛”）
- 云存档 & 成就功能

Hey there! We're the team behind Boom 3D, and we've created the ultimate Safari extension to give you an incredible Netflix experience. With our extension, you can enjoy high-quality 5.1 surround sound and 1080p video with compatible content on Netflix. The accompanying Boom3D desktop app will take your sound to a whole new level of immersion and realism with our patented 3D audio technology, and it works with absolutely ANY headphones.

But why is 5.1 surround sound so great? Well, when you're watching a movie or show, you want to feel like you're right in the middle of the action, right? 5.1 surround sound does exactly that. With five separate audio channels plus a subwoofer channel, you get a more realistic and immersive audio experience. You can hear every detail, from subtle whispers to thunderous explosions, and feel like you're right in the middle of the scene.

We created this extension to help you take your Netflix experience to the next level. By enabling 5.1 output, you can enjoy a more immersive and cinematic viewing experience, all from the comfort of your own home.

It's important to note that the 5.1 audio can only be enabled on compatible content. 1080p video can only be enabled on select Netflix plans and require sufficient internet bandwidth.

Overall, we're really excited about the Safari extension, and we hope you are too! So what are you waiting for? 
Enable the extension and start experiencing your favorite shows and movies like never before.

Disclaimer: The Netflix trademark belongs to Netflix, Inc. This extension has no affiliation or connection to Netflix or any other third-party companies.	

Follow us on:
•	Twitter: https://twitter.com/boomapp/ 
•	Facebook: https://facebook.com/boomapp/ 
•	Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/boomaudioapp 
•	YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@BoomAudioApp

cn.trackName: 允许 Safari 右键单击
cn.description: 该软件允许在所有网站上使用右键单击、复制、剪切和粘贴功能。它具有简单的界面，易于使用。您可以复制任何内容，无论是文本、图像还是其他媒体。
cn.trackCensoredName: 允许 Safari 右键单击

cn.trackName: STEP 和 IGES 文件查看器
cn.description: 适用于 STEP/STP、IGES/IGS 和其他 3D 文件格式的专业 3D 查看器。支持轻松打印和转换 3D 文件。
cn.trackCensoredName: STEP 和 IGES 文件查看器

cn.trackCensoredName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.releaseNotes: - 提升应用稳定性，确保产品使用更加稳定。
cn.trackName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.description:
UPDF 是一款全球化的 PDF 编辑器，支持 AI，阅读，编辑，注释、云同步、转换、加密、裁剪、拆分、在线分享 PDF 文档等。1 个账号付费，全平台都可以使用（电脑 + 手机 + iPad），更重要的是，UPDF 不同于市场上大多数商务设计风的 PDF 软件，它更具年轻化高颜值的界面设计让你拥有一个愉快轻松的阅读和办公体验。

主要功能：

1. 编辑 PDF
- 你可以添加或者删除文本，编辑文本属性和格式，比如字体，颜色，大小等。
- UPDF 也支持通过修改文本的对齐方式使您的文档看起来更整洁。
- 对于 PDF 里的图片，你可以进行裁剪，旋转，替换，提取，删除等操作。
- 你可以直接通过拖拽添加和替换图片。
- 支持添加、删除、和编辑水印、背景、以及页眉页脚。

2. AI 功能
- 对 PDF 文档进行总结。
- 对 PDF 文档进行翻译。
- 对 PDF 文档进行解释，润色或编写。
- 与 UPDF AI 自由对话。
- 支持与图片进行自由问答。
- 支持将文档总结生成思维导图。

3. 注释 PDF
- 在阅读 PDF 文档的过程中，你可以对文档内容添加注释，比如高亮，下划线，删除线来标注突出重点内容。
- 你也可以通过添加图形和文本框来注释你的 PDF 文档。
- 如果需要对某些内容进行注解，你可以在文档任意位置添加便签来输入笔记或者审批意见等。
- 你可以在文档中添加并旋转各种各样的签章和贴纸用以注释和评论。
- 若需要在文档里签名，你也可以直接快速地创建你的签名。
- 通过注释列表一键查看或删除所有注释内容。

4. OCR（光学字符识别）（仅适用于官网下载的版本）
- 将扫描的 PDF 转换为可搜索和可编辑的 PDF。
- 支持可根据选择检测的 38 种语言。
- 将可搜索和可编辑的 PDF 转换为纯图像 PDF。

5. 转换 PDF
- 你可以将 PDF 转换为 Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Image, HTML, Text, CSV, XML, PDF/A 等格式。
- 转换之后的文档会保持原文档格式不变。

6. 云同步
- 支持上传文档至 UPDF Cloud，实现 PC + 移动端全平台同步。

7. 管理 PDF 页面
- UPDF 使你可以根据你的需要轻松快速地管理 PDF 页面。
- 对于页面布局，你可以通过旋转调整页面方向，通过拖拽页面调整页面顺序。
- 如果你需要文档中的某些页面，你可以直接提取它们；另外，当你不需要某个页面时，也可以直接删除它。
- 你可以添加空白页或者从其他文件中添加页面。
- 你也可以快速替换文档中的页面。
- 快速根据页码拆分一个 PDF 文档为多个文档。
- 根据需要自定义裁剪页面大小。

8. 浏览和定位 PDF 文档
- 你可以放大或缩小页面，清晰地浏览文档内容。
- 通过在页面添加书签，快速定位找到需要的页面。
- 如果你需要同时查看多个 PDF 文档，不用在另外的窗口打开阅览它们，你可以在同一窗口多个标签打开预览，这样更简单快捷。
- 想要快速找到某文本内容，可以一键搜索查找定位文本。
- 快速通过缩略图旋转，删除，旋转和打印 PDF 页面。
- 通过幻灯片的形式播放 PDF 文档。

9. 保护文档
- 可添加文档打开密码防止未经授权的用户打开。
- 可设置文档功能权限控制密码，限制其他用户打印、编辑、复制 PDF 文档等。

10. 创建 PDF
- 创建空白页。
- 从选区、窗口、或屏幕捕捉创建 PDF。

11. 扁平化 PDF
- 快速扁平化 PDF, 压平文档中的图层。

12. 分享 PDF 文档
- 你可以直接在线分享或者通过邮件直接分享文档。
- 通过电子邮件将您的文档作为附件共享。

应用内购包含的功能
- 无水印保存修改的文档。 
- 无限制的转换文档。 （免费试用版每天最多可转换 2 个文档）

一个会员账号适用于所有平台。

需要帮助？如果你有任何问题，可以邮件联系我们：support@superace.com.
你也可以通过关注我们的官方公众号获取更多有用的信息。
微信公众号：UPDF
微博：赛博爱思UPDF

如果你觉得这个 App 对你是有帮助的，可以在 App Store 留下你的评价，谢谢！

cn.releaseNotes:
Remixlive 8.4 扩展了您在步进音序器中的创作可能性，加入了复音功能！

8.4 版本：
新功能：
- 多音阶步进音序器： 通过直观创新的界面创作旋律并弹奏和弦，重新定义步进音序器。

改进：
- 修复错误并改进用户界面
cn.description:
Remixlive是制作人和DJ的完美节拍制作和现场表演应用。

播放、干扰、混合和重新混合你的音乐。直播!
• 最多可以播放48个音调和节奏同步的循环片段 
• 实时改变调子和BPM
• 即兴演奏和录制现场鼓和乐器
• 使用专业级FXs实时塑造和重采样你的声音
• 创建你自己的序列和模式
• 在时间轴上安排你的声音来完成你的歌曲

用独家样本库为你的曲目增添色彩!
• 在20多种音乐类型中获得超过32000个专业级样本
• 由顶级声音设计师和世界级艺术家完美打造。
• 免收版权费用，可在任何平台上进行个人和商业使用。
• 每周都有新内容！

享受先进的专业级功能!
• 专业音频引擎和样本时间拉伸
• 导入你自己的样本（MP3、WAV、AAC、M4A、AIFF、16/24比特）。
• 连接任何MIDI控制器，你想要多少就有多少 (Launchpad Mini/MK2/MK3/Pro/S/X, AKAI APCMini/MPKminiMK3/APCKey25, DJControl Compact...)
• 用我们的AI干线分离算法对任何歌曲进行混音
• 记录和采样任何音源（Audiobus/麦克风/声卡）
• 通过Ableton Link ""与你的朋友们进行现场演出。

Remixlive拥有您所需要的一切，以创建令人惊叹的曲目，释放您的创造力，并进行令人难忘的现场表演。任何地方!

他们喜欢remixlive

"在便携式设备上制作专业音轨的非常直观的方法。"
- DJ Mag (新闻)

"我已经把Remixlive整合到我的DJ组合中，它提供了很多创造性的潜力。我会向任何艺术家推荐Remixlive，因为它非常简单，你可以创造出很多有趣和鼓舞人心的东西！"
- T78（艺术家）

"绝对令人惊奇的应用程序，太有趣了！它就像一个混合的Dj和一个混合的音乐播放器。它就像一个混合的Dj和作曲工具。我被它的力量和可靠性震惊了。"
- Crystalogic（Remixlive用户）

高级计划和购买
您可以选择单独购买样品包和功能，或通过订阅计划一次性解锁所有功能。

高级订阅计划
Remixlive有月度或年度订阅计划，可以解锁所有可用的和未来的功能，让你获得整个26000多个样本库以及每周一个新的样本包。

条款和条件
购买确认后，付款将从您的账户中扣除。除非在当前期限结束前至少24小时关闭自动续订，否则订阅将自动续订。账户将在当前期限结束前24小时内被收取续订费用，并确定续订费用。订阅可以由用户管理，自动续订可以在购买后进入用户的账户设置中关闭。

使用条款
https://www.mixvibes.com/terms

隐私政策
https://www.mixvibes.com/privacy

cn.description:
任何FLAC转换器是最好的和易于使用的FLAC音频转换器。它作为一个特殊的FLAC到MP3转换软件，将FLAC文件更改为MP3，用于媒体或MP3播放器。它可以将任何FLAC音乐转换为适用于iOS设备（如iPhone，iPad和iPod）的AAC / WAV / ALAC / OGG / WMA / AIFF等。它也可以将FLAC转换为iTunes，让您享受免费的歌曲。这个强大的FLAC文件转换器可以将任何视频/音频文档解压缩并转换成FLAC格式，包括将MP3转换为FLAC，将FLV转换为FLAC，将FLV转换为FLAC，将FLV转换为FLAC，将FLV转换为FLAC，将FLASH转换为FLAC。

主要特征：
1.将任何FLAC文件转换为其他音频/声音格式，如MP3
作为专业的FLAC（免费无损音频编解码器）转换工具，它可以将任何FLAC音频转换为MP3，WAV，Apple Lossless（ALAC），iTunes，AIFF，AC3，AU，M4A，MP3，OGG，RA和WMA。

2.将任何视频/音乐文件（如MP4）解压缩并转换为FLAC
除了直接将.flac转换为.mp3，.wav，.wma，.m4r等外，还可以转换MP4，AVI，MOV，FLV，MKV，WMV等视频文件，MP3，AAC， M4A，WAV，AIFF，WAV，ALAC，OGG等，包括录制的电影和声音.flac相反。

3.在iTunes，iPad，iPhone和其他便携式设备或媒体播放器上享受转换的FLAC文件
该FLAC转换器可以轻松地将FLAC文件转换为iTunes支持的音频格式。它还可以将FLAC转换为iPad Pro / Air / mini，iPhone 7/7 plus / SE / 6s / 6s plus / 6/6 plus / 5s / 5，iPod touch / nano / shuffle，支持的音频格式以及许多其他mp3玩家享受。

4.免费编辑输出音频文件
免费修剪任何长度的音频文件进行转换。调整音频比特率，音频通道，采样率，输出音频文件的音量，以获得更好的效果。

无损音频质量和超快的转换速度
使用此FLAC转换器，将FLAC转换为MP3 / WAV / ALAC和其他音频格式将永远不会成为您的问题。而且您不需要担心转换音频质量和闪电转换速度。

如果您对任何FLAC转换器有任何疑问，请通过macsupport@tipard.com与我们联系

us.description:
Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs?

Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily.
 
Features:
1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones)
2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs
3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects!

Subscription instrutions：
- After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features
- Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service
- Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent
- The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account
- Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period
- Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription.
- You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html 
- You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html  to read the Terms of Service
*The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

us.description:
QuickFox is a high-quality accelerator specially created for overseas Chinese and students. It is a accelerator for overseas Chinese to watch TV dramas, listen to songs, play games, live events, business offices, futures and stock trading, etc.

It has now provided high-quality return acceleration services to millions of overseas Chinese students around the world. It is one-click direct connection, stable and easy to use, and is the first choice for overseas Chinese around the world to accelerate their links to China.

Please note: This product is only available to overseas users. Users in mainland China cannot use this product service normally, please download with caution.

【QuickFox main functions】
*Connect to the domestic network with one click, and visit domestic applications and web pages with low latency.
*Reduced latency for Chinese server games: various popular Chinese server games such as Honor of Kings, Identity V, Peace Elite, Eggboy Party, DNF, Genshin Impact, Steam, etc. have stable connections and ultra-low latency.
- Covering global dedicated servers, high-speed connection with low latency fluctuations, stable switching and continuous connection.
- One account can be switched seamlessly, and multiple devices can be logged in at the same time, making it convenient and fast.

[QuickFox technical advantages]
*High-speed dedicated server.
*Global nodes, stable acceleration.
*High-level encryption, privacy guaranteed.

[Continuous monthly membership]
1. Benefits: accelerated advertising-free, exclusive super VIP member servers, etc.
2. 1-month subscription.
3. Subscription price: Continuous monthly subscription for RMB 40
4. Payment: Credited to the iTunes account after payment
5. Cancel renewal: Manually turn off the automatic renewal function in iTunes/Apple ID settings within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires.
6. Renewal: Apple's iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period.
7. Privacy Policy: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/agreement
8. Continuous monthly membership service agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/monthlyVipAgreement
9. VIP Service Agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/memberServiceAgreement
10. Terms of Service: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/clause
============================
Email: info@quickfox.com.cn
WeChat public account: QuickFox
============================

Cleaner One Pro is the all-in-one Mac Master Cleaner App. It can optimize your disk usage, free up space on your Mac, keep the hard drive clean, remove duplicate photos and other files, manage your apps, and much more. 

Fully compatible with macOS Monterey and Apple Silicon.

PRIMARY FEATURES
[Junk Files Cleaner]
• Has Quick Disk Clean feature you can click from the Status Bar Menu
• Clean temporary files, including logs, mail caches, iTunes and iOS temporary files, etc. Empty Trash for current user
• Detect remaining files after deleting Apps
• Clean Junk Files in removable storage on your Mac
 
[Duplicate File Scanner]
• Thorough and quick scan — fast and accurate scanning technique covers your entire home folder
• Smart and Accurate Filter — duplicates are selected not only by file name but also by their content. Files are shown in detailed preview. Click the Auto Select button to help you decide which copy you wish to delete.
• Easy and safe decision — duplicates can be sorted by file type and listed in their full route for you to track. You can decide which way to clean these files; either by sending them to Trash or deleting them permanently (In-App Purchase required)

[Photo Manager]
• Quickly find similar photos, blurry photos, and screenshots
• Preview photos in groups after scanning
• Organize your photo library
• Easily remove photos that may be safe to delete to free up space (In-App Purchase required)
 
[Intelligent App Manager]
• Auto-clean leftovers of deleted Apps
• Manage all installed applications with the All-in-One App Optimizer
• Detect and remove leftover files of deleted apps with the App Manager
• List all the applications installed on your Mac by name, size, and last opened date
• Remove unwanted applications with Mac Disk Clean (In-App Purchase required)
• Remove all the associated files of uninstalled applications (In-App Purchase required)
• Added Vulnerability Scan in the App Manager to enhance security (In-App Purchase required)

[Big Files Scanner]
• 1-click scan of big files (customizable size from 10 MB and above)
• Multiple filters of size, date, name and type
• Local files in sync with your cloud drives can also be found
* Important big files can be ""locked"" into the protected list to avoid accidental deletion

[Mac Disk Clean Map]
• Mac Disk Clean scans all your disk drives and creates a clickable map of the files on your disk, color-coded by type
• Provides additional information about files when you click on an item on the map
• View your entire disk by file or folder size to determine which files or folders use the most space with Clean Master

[Real-Time System Status]
• Real-time network usage
• Real-time CPU usage
• See detailed network and CPU information (In-App Purchase required)

The paid version costs as little as $19.99 per year (this price may vary by location).
 
Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled.
— Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
— Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Setting after purchase.
— No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
— Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
— Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

us.description:
SQLPro Studio is the premium database management tool for Postgres, MySQL, Microsoft Management Studio and Oracle databases.

Some of the great features include:
+ Intellisense/SQL autocompletion.
+ Syntax highlighting with customizable themes (including dark).
+ Tabbed based interface for an optimal user experience.
+ Context aware database tree navigation, including quick access to tables, views, columns, indexes and much more!
+ SQL Beautifier/formatter.
+ Database wide searching.
+ NTLMv2 supported (but not required).
+ Netbios support.
+ Master password support for additional security.
+ Supports Handoff from iOS to macOS.

SQLPro Studio supports the following database servers:
+ MySQL & MariaDB
+ PostgreSQL
+ Microsoft SQL Server (2005 and above)
+ SnowflakeDB
+ SQLite
+ Oracle (8i and above)

Privacy Policy:
https://hankinsoft.com/privacypolicy.html

Terms of Use:
https://hankinsoft.com/termsofuse.html

Price:
SQLPro offers Premium subscriptions (or a single Lifetime purchase) in order to interact with database result sets. Premium subscriptions are available as either a Monthly, or a Yearly duration. Subscriptions auto-renew within 24 hours of the expiration date unless auto-renewal is turned off in the iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

Hey there! We're the team behind Boom 3D, and we've created the ultimate Safari extension to give you an incredible Netflix experience. With our extension, you can enjoy high-quality 5.1 surround sound and 1080p video with compatible content on Netflix. The accompanying Boom3D desktop app will take your sound to a whole new level of immersion and realism with our patented 3D audio technology, and it works with absolutely ANY headphones.

But why is 5.1 surround sound so great? Well, when you're watching a movie or show, you want to feel like you're right in the middle of the action, right? 5.1 surround sound does exactly that. With five separate audio channels plus a subwoofer channel, you get a more realistic and immersive audio experience. You can hear every detail, from subtle whispers to thunderous explosions, and feel like you're right in the middle of the scene.

We created this extension to help you take your Netflix experience to the next level. By enabling 5.1 output, you can enjoy a more immersive and cinematic viewing experience, all from the comfort of your own home.

It's important to note that the 5.1 audio can only be enabled on compatible content. 1080p video can only be enabled on select Netflix plans and require sufficient internet bandwidth.

Overall, we're really excited about the Safari extension, and we hope you are too! So what are you waiting for? 
Enable the extension and start experiencing your favorite shows and movies like never before.

Disclaimer: The Netflix trademark belongs to Netflix, Inc. This extension has no affiliation or connection to Netflix or any other third-party companies.	

Follow us on:
•	Twitter: https://twitter.com/boomapp/ 
•	Facebook: https://facebook.com/boomapp/ 
•	Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/boomaudioapp 
•	YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@BoomAudioApp

A professional 3D viewer for STEP/STP, IGES/IGS, and other 3D file formats. Supports printing and converting 3D files with ease.

This app is a tool designed for users to hide the mouse cursor, which is particularly suitable for full-screen presentations, video playback or games, allowing users to focus on the content without being disturbed by the cursor, including one-click hiding/showing the cursor, shortcut key support, and custom settings.

us.description:
UPDF is an all-in-one AI-integrated PDF editor toolkit you can use to summarize, translate, read, edit, annotate, organize, convert, OCR, crop, watermark, flatten, secure, share, or print PDF files, convert PDFs to mind maps, and chat with images. Get all the tools you need to manage PDFs in one premier, all-rounder smart app for your Mac. One UPDF license allows you to use it across all platforms, both desktop and mobile.

Key features:

AI Assistant
- AI chat with your PDF to summarize, translate, explain, and rephrase lengthy PDFs in minutes.
- Convert PDFs to mind maps.
- Upload images and ask any questions about the images.
- Ask any prompts and get answers from AI.

Edit PDFs
- Add/edit the text, images, and links in PDF.
- Change the color, font style, size, orientation, and other parameters of the text.
- Add, crop, resize, extract, replace, rotate, or remove the images.
- Add, edit, or remove watermarks from PDFs.
- Set color, image, or document as a background for PDFs.
- Add, edit, or remove header and footer from PDFs.

Annotate PDFs
- Highlight, underline, strikethrough, or squiggly the text in PDFs.
- Add sticky notes, text boxes, text comments, text callouts to PDFs.
- Add shapes (rectangles, ovals, lines, arrows, hexagons, triangles) to PDFs.
- Use the pencil and eraser tools for free-hand drawing within a PDF.
- Add stamps and stickers to PDFs.
- Add signatures to PDFs.
- Manage the annotation list.

Compare PDF
- Find differences between two similar files.

UPDF Cloud
- Seamlessly access your files across different devices and sync your files across all platforms in real time.

OCR (exclusively available in the program that you download from our website)
- Convert scanned PDFs or images into searchable and editable PDFs or vice versa.
- Can recognize 38 languages as per choice.

Convert PDFs
- Convert PDFs to all major Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX.
- Convert PDFs to major image formats: PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF, and GIF.
- Convert PDFs to other file formats such as TXT, RTF, CSV, HTML, and XML.
- "Text Recognition (OCR)" feature included converting scanned PDFs to editable formats.

Organize PDF Pages
- Insert, replace, extract, split, rotate, remove, and reorder the pages in PDFs
- Crop PDF pages.

Protect PDFs
- Add an open password to protect PDFs from being opened without authorization.
- Add a permission password to protect PDFs from copying, editing, and printing.
- Offers 3 different encryption levels: 128-bit RC4, 128-bit AES, and 256-bit AES.
- Remove the PDF password from your document.

Read and Print PDFs
- View PDF in multiple modes: Single Page View/Scrolling, Two Page View/Scrolling.
- Text to speech.
- Search and find text.
- Open and view multiple PDFs in tabs.
- Slideshow PDF.
- Support switching to dark mode.
- Add and manage bookmarks in PDF.
- Print PDFs.

Create PDFs
- Create blank PDF or from Word/Excel/PPT/image.

Fill & Sign
- Create fillable PDF forms.
- Fill and sign PDF with keyboard, mouse, trackpad, or from images, save to the cloud and use across platforms.
- Digital signatures.

PDF/A Conversion Supported
- Save your PDF files in PDF/A format to archive data.

Flatten PDFs
- Save your PDF files as flattened into a single-layer PDF.

Batch Process PDFs
- Batch combine, convert, encrypt, create bulk of PDFs or Insert PDF file into multiple PDFs with a click

Pro Features of In-App Purchase
- Use UPDF across all platforms including desktops and mobiles.
- Save the new edits without the UPDF watermark.
- Batch Convert unlimited PDF files ( Batch Convert up to 5 documents in the trial version).
- Free Users will get 1 GB of Cloud Storage; Paid UPDF users get 10 GB and AI users get 100 GB.

Need help? If you have any questions about this app, please email us at support@superace.com.
You can follow us on
Facebook: @superacesoftware
Twitter: @updfeditor
Youtube: @updf1337
Instagram: @updfeditor

If you feel this app is helpful, please rate us on the App Store. Thank you!

us.description:
--- Experience Your Music with Vythm ---
Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely.

--- Your Vision, Your Visualization ---
Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision:
- Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds.
- MIDI input for precise visual control.
- NDI streaming support for sharing your creations.
- Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more.
- Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments.
And much more!

The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription.

--- Input Formats ---
Select your music from a variety of sources:
- Import any mp3 or m4a files.
- Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported).
- Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases.
- Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration.

--- Record Your Masterpiece ---
Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece.

--- Share Your Thoughts ---
Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org.

If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm!

Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today!

us.description:
Any FLAC Converter is the best and easy-to-use FLAC audio Converter. It works as a special FLAC to MP3 Converting software to change FLAC file to MP3 for media or MP3 Players. It can convert any FLAC music to AAC/WAV/ALAC/OGG/WMA/AIFF, etc. for iOS devices like iPhone, iPad and iPod. It can also convert FLAC to iTunes for your free songs enjoyment. This powerful FLAC file Converter can extract and convert any Video/Audio documents to FLAC format, including convert MP3 to FLAC, WAV to FLAC, MP4 to FLAC, FLV to FLAC, Apple Lossless to FLAC and so on.

Key Features:
1. Convert any FLAC file to other audio/sound formats like MP3
As the professional FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec) conversion tool, it can convert any FLAC audio to MP3, WAV, Apple Lossless (ALAC), iTunes, AIFF, AC3, AU, M4A, MP3, OGG, RA, and WMA.

2. Extract and convert any Video/Music Files like MP4 to FLAC
Besides converting .flac to .mp3, .wav, .wma, .m4r, etc. directly, you can also convert any video file like MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV, etc. and audio like MP3, AAC, M4A, WAV, AIFF, WAV, ALAC, OGG, etc. including recorded movie and sounds to .flac contrarily.

3. Enjoy the converted FLAC files on iTunes, iPad, iPhone and other portable devices or media players
This FLAC Converter can easily translate FLAC files to iTunes supported audio formats easily. It can also convert FLAC to iPad Pro/Air/mini, iPhone 7/7 plus/SE/6s/6s plus/6/6 plus/5s/5, iPod touch/nano/shuffle, supported audio formats and also many other mp3 players for enjoyment.

4. Free edit Output Audio Files
Free trim any length of the audio file to convert. Adjust audio bitrates, audio channels, sample rate, volume of the output audio files for better effects.

5. Lossless audio quality and super fast conversion speed
With this FLAC Converter, converting FLAC to MP3/WAV/ALAC and other audio formats will never be a problem for you. And you don’t need to worry about the converted audio quality and the lightning converting speed.

If you have any question about Any FLAC Converter, please contact us via macsupport@tipard.com
